attributes.action: Make the old American Adventure site lake public to fishermen.
attributes.background: American Adventure is a old theme park, closing in 2007 the lake was left stranded and fishermen try and fish it but get removed off the site.

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
